name: Puzzle game kids age 2-3 years
description:
An interesting puzzle game for children ages 2-3 years. The kid will collect the picture from the pieces.

Jigsaw Puzzles is:

• there is no advertising;
• nice interface;
• beautiful graphics;
• pictures with images of animals;
• The game is adapted for the child's age;
• A useful game for the development of memory and logic.
